label: 佛舎利使
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Buddha relic envoys who were sent forth from the Shingon chapel of the greater imperial palace carrying relic- stūpa s to shrines (yashiro) throughout the realm to mark the Great Relics Offering (ichidai ichido busshari hōken) following the Daijōe accession rite. The envoys were novice-monks.
